## FASTQC

These are ids for the reports of the samples.

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)
fqc_files <- list.files( path = params$fastqc, pattern = "*.html" )
str_split_i( fqc_files, "_", 1 ) %>% 
    str_unique()
```
